description.value:
Requirements You're in an elemental stance.

Your blows can disrupt the delicate balance of elemental energies that keep a body in good health. Strike the target using the unarmed attack associated with your current elemental stance. On a success, the target must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:class] save against your class DC. On a failure, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} until the end of your next turn. On a critical failure, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 3} for 1 minute. Elementals take a â€“2 circumstance penalty to their save.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
